display_long_description:
Extend the Christmas’ Magic! 

Gifts and Snowballs is a festive skirmish game like no other. 

Step into the boundless imagination of a child, where their favorite figurines come to life as cheerful heroes of an epic adventure sparked by a clumsy Santa Claus. 

Progress through levels and strategically position your units on the map to claim victory. 

Your mission? Hold off your opponents and secure as many gifts as possible to save Christmas! 

[media]

# Intuitive Gameplay
- Grab and place your units on the map. 
- Upgrade your units to boost efficiency. 
- Expand your team. 

[media]

# A Joyful Atmosphere
- Lovable characters with charming abilities. 
- Levels with diverse challenges. 
- A heartwarming soundtrack. 

[media]

#Enhanced Accessibility

- No controllers required. 
- Seamless VR/AR switch. 
- Play comfortably seated.



# Early access available now !

[media]

# Chat with us on discord !

Want to ask question or give feedback ? Join our discord : 

https://discord.gg/d7qA2KNYS6
